resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157015</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157015</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2683</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Repository of animations on the subject of earth science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Behälter von Animationen bezüglich der 
Geowissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un dépôt des animations au sujet de la science 
de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um repositório dos animations no assunto da 
ciência de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un deposito delle animazioni a proposito di 
scienze della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αποθήκη των ζωτικοτήτων σχετικά με το θέμα της 
γήινης επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un depósito de animaciones a propósito de la 
geología</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A large collection of animations which illustrate different phenomena of the universe and earth science , marine sciences, meteorology, astronomy and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth science; astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meteorology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geological phenomenon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine große Ansammlung Animationen, die 
unterschiedliche Phänomene der Universum- und Geowissenschaft, der 
Marinewissenschaften, der Meteorologie, der Astronomie und mehr 
veranschaulichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une grande collection d'animations qui illustrent 
différents phénomènes de la science de la terre d'univers et, des 
sciences marines, de la météorologie, de l'astronomie et de plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção grande dos animations que ilustram 
fenômenos diferentes da ciência do universo e de terra, de ciências
marinhas, de meteorologia, de astronomia e de mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'ampia raccolta delle animazioni che illustrano 
i fenomeni differenti delle scienze della terra e dell'universo, delle
scienze marine, della meteorologia, dell'astronomia e di più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μεγάλη συλλογή των ζωτικοτήτων που επεξηγούν τα 
διαφορετικά φαινόμενα του κόσμου και της γήινης επιστήμης, των 
ναυτιλιακών επιστημών, της μετεωρολογίας, της αστρονομίας και 
περισσότεροι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección grande de las animaciones que 
ilustran diversos fenómenos de la geología del universo y, de 
ciencias marinas, de la meteorología, de la astronomía y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaft; Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meteorologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geologisches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">science de la terre ; astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">météorologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène géologique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência de terra; astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">meteorologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno geological</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze della terra; astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno geologico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">meteorología</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
